title: Recognize, Assist, Include, Support, and Engage Family Caregivers Act of 2017
content: Recognize, Assist, Include, Support, and Engage Family Caregivers Act of 2017 or the RAISE Family Caregivers Act This bill directs the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) to develop and make publicly available a National Family Caregiving Strategy that identifiesnbsp. Recommended actions for recognizing and supporting family caregivers in a manner that reflects their diverse needs. HHS shall convene a Family Caregiving Advisory Council to advise the departmentnbsp. On recognizing and supporting family caregivers. The council shall terminate after five years.
